FuncDef: This command configures the MAC address for the associated satellite chassis. This MAC address is used to validate the identity of an satellite that attempts to associate with the local host.

ParaDef.Info: Specifies the MAC address of the associated satellite chassis; do not use a broadcast or multicast MAC. Enter the MAC address in either of the following formats: xx:xx:xx:xx:xx:xx or xx-xx-xx-xx-xx-xx.
